author: cbs8
title: NAPW Inducts Yelena Mazarczyk, Director of Post-Production Services, CMI Media Management, Into its VIP Professional Woman of the Year Circle
text:
Yelena Mazarczyk selected for her outstanding leadership and commitment within her profession
Garden City, NY (PRWEB) September 29, 2015
The National Association of Professional Women (NAPW) honors Yelena Makarczyk as a 2015-2016 inductee into its VIP Woman of the Year Circle. She is being recognized with this prestigious distinction for leadership in business. NAPW is the nation’s leading networking organization exclusively for professional women, boasting more than 700,000 members and over 200 operating Local Chapters.
“I’m pleased to welcome Yelena into this exceptional group of professional women,” said NAPW President Star Jones.” Her knowledge and experience in her industry are valuable assets to her company and community.”
As Director of Post-Production Services at CMI Media Management , Yelena Makarczyk brings her clients a rich and varied experience in all recognized broadcast and streaming platforms, as well as an unwavering commitment to keep pace with the evolving digital landscape.
Ms. Makarczyk oversees CMI’s operations in Studio City, CA, which include CCSL and ABS creation, translation, language replacement (ADR or dubbing), subtitling and captioning. Other post-production services include film editing and audio-description.
“There are specific skills required in knowing how to make sure a project truly translates from one language to another,” said Ms. Makarczyk. “I honor the integrity of each language through a unique approach to every project, applying literary knowledge and a creative touch to the context of the client’s intended message.”
Ms. Makarczyk’s proficiency in multiple languages and in-depth cultural knowledge enable her to consistently exceed the expectations of studios and production houses, both domestically and globally. Under her direction in Studio City, CMI continues to offer a consistent level of excellence that is setting the company apart from its competitors.
“With two decades of experience in this industry, I am well-known for a singular passion that makes every project a true collaboration,” she said. “I love my work, and it shows.”
Awards & Accomplishments: Bachelor’s, University of California, Los Angeles, English Language and World Literature / Letters, Documentary Film
LinkedIn
About NAPW
NAPW’s mission is to provide an exclusive, highly advanced networking forum to successful women executives, professionals and entrepreneurs where they can aspire, connect and achieve. Through innovative resources, unique tools and progressive benefits, professional women interact, exchange ideas, advance their knowledge and empower each other.
